name: Three year anniversary
description:
Hello everyone!

Shadow Jumper, my first game on itch, was released on July 27, 2018. Since then, I've made another seven games.

For the 3rd anniversary of this itch page, as well as my game developer career, I've decided to release my first ever "finished" game for everyone to play. It has some bugs, but it doesn't matter to me because I remember how much time and effort I put into making it, and it is like a lovely old memory for me.

I wish you will enjoy the game, and have a wonderful day :D
